'''"Four-Quadrant Cooking Cauldron"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Four-Quadrant Cooking Cauldron" is obtained by completing [[Adeptal Mirror]] Round 4.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
